suite.doc: ğŸ“§ Mail Configuration Validation Test Suite - Test-17 ğŸ” Process: Find hostname in EDS â†’ SSH to server â†’ Collect mail/SMTP configuration â†’ Validate relay settings âœ… Validates: SMTP relay server (mail.domain.com), port connectivity, mail.rc configuration, test email delivery ğŸ“Š Documents: MX records, SMTP connectivity, mail queue status, relay configuration âš ï¸ Note: This test validates mail configuration if required in project scope
